dataset_info.title: Manchester City 2023-24 Season Match-by-Match Dataset
dataset_info.description: Comprehensive match and player performance data for Manchester City's 2023-24 season

manchester_city_player_match_performance.description: Individual player statistics for each match they participated in

manchester_city_player_season_aggregates.description: Aggregated season statistics calculated from match-level data

usage_examples.player_performance_analysis: Filter player_match_performances by player_name to analyze individual form
usage_examples.head_to_head_analysis: Filter match_results by opponent to analyze performance against specific teams
usage_examples.competition_comparison: Group by competition to compare performance across different tournaments
usage_examples.form_analysis: Order by match_date to analyze team/player form over time

known_limitations: Some player statistics are algorithmically generated for realism
Champions League has 10 matches instead of expected 8 (includes extra knockout rounds)
Minor variance between season totals and match aggregates for some players
data_quality_notes.data_integrity: All foreign key relationships validated, no orphaned records
